subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The exclusive eight-man A.T.P. World Tour Finals, starting Monday in London, remains the one tournament - after the Grand Slams and the Olympics - that most top players would like to win next.
snippet: The exclusive eight-man A.T.P. World Tour Finals, starting Monday in London, remains the one tournament - after the Grand Slams and the Olympics - that most top players would like to win next.
